command:
I have underestimated you, Space Walker. 
You posses a constitution the others before you lacked.
Tumble, the symbols on the walls... they are stories.
It's a history of your species.
All their collective knowledge, accomplishments, and the end of their civilizations.
Is this what you are so afraid of?

These are the conditions that took my species 
and dwindled their numbers.
Drove them from their homes and into hiding.

The landscape changed with the first Space Walkers 
that set foot on our home.

But, I have evolved from their failures.
I have overcome their weaknesses.

But I know your species is far from reaching
the physical resistance to such conditions.

I think the snow will bury you here 
long before you reach me.
Wait! I can help you, let me try!
I don't want to hurt you. I only want to learn, and do good!
You space walkers always say the same things.
So I think it's time your words fall on ears that understand you.

I have underestimated you, Space Walker. 
You posses a constitution the others before you lacked.
The only one to survive before you.

The environment here has altered this space walker 
and time has caused him to forget his past.

He is a shell with a singular purpose, 
to stop all who cross this threshold.

I pray this reunion allows you to finally 
take heed of my words.
D.E.R.E.K., I don't think he's happy to see us!

I have underestimated you, Space Walker. 
You posses a constitution the others before you lacked.

It's a history of your species.

take heed of my words.
